question:
Question: You are navigating to the balcony on the 14th floor. What is the correct summary of your trajectory from the beginning to the current location?  
Choice:  
A. I start from the park, move towards the road, ascend to the high-rise building, and finally reach the 14th-floor balcony.  
B. I start from the street, fly over parks and high-rise buildings, and then descend to the 14th-floor balcony.  
C. I start from the park, rise to the height of the roof of a high-rise building, circle it, and then descend to my current location on the 14th floor.  
D. I launch from the rooftop of a high-rise building, descend to street level, and then head to a park.  
E. I start from the left side of the building with a huge conical dome, turn right, and descend to a certain height.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The trajectory starts from a high vantage point on the left side of a building with a conical dome, moves rightward, and then descends to a lower height, aligning with the description in option E. The other options do not match the visual sequence of starting at a high point near a distinctive building feature and then descending.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 33)]
Option: [E]
Reason: The video starts with a view from a high vantage point, near a building with a conical dome. The camera then turns right and descends to the 14th floor. This matches the description in option E.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The trajectory starts from a high vantage point on the left side of a building with a conical dome, moves rightward, and then descends to a lower height, aligning with the description in option E. The other options do not match the visual sequence of starting at a high point near a distinctive building feature and then descending.
